physical_appearance:\The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a forested landscape. There are tall trees as well as dense shrubs. A body of water can be seen in the foreground of the photograph. Shrouded amidst the greenery to the right of the photograph
 a roofed building can be discerned. \\Atap Palms 108\\ is stated in white at the lower right hand side of the photograph. \

sgcool_label_text:The photograph from G. R. Lambert shows atap palms (also known as nipah palms) growing beside a river or pool with a European bungalow in the background.

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a forested landscape. There are tall trees as well as dense shrubs. A body of water can be seen in the foreground of the photograph. Shrouded amidst the greenery to the right of the photograph, a roofed building can be discerned. ""Atap Palms 108"" is stated in white at the lower right hand side of the photograph. "
